channel.title: Why does noone help me?!?
channel.description:
I need help with no-ip and noone seems to be trying, but it would be greatly appreciated. I port forwarded for my router and my comps firewall, and it did work fine. I was gone for 2 days and I come back and it doesnt work anymore? [code] [Mon 19:45] Checking Remote IP Address. [Mon 19:45] Current IP address found, [/code]
I assume that means it is working correctly, and it says [code] [Mon 19:52] Updating host: [Mon 19:52] : DNS is current, no update needed. [/code] which I also assume is working correctly. I opened a support ticket and all they had to say is "Are you sure it is using the right router IP" and "Is the update client finding the IP correctly" Now, while i was gone, my IP changed, but I don't think that is a problem.
anybody?

item.title: Why does noone help me?!?
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

k tyvm…would rep++ but i need 15 to do it lol

ok umm now it lets me log on but still nobosy else can get on

Read full topic

item.title: Why does noone help me?!?
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

ok when you have the No-IP DUC open look for a button that says options
click it…

another screen will open…
click on the “connection tab”

now stick witht he page that appears

right you will see :

“overide automatic connection detection”
tick the box beside that and in the drop down menu choose the hardware that is your network card

ok then click 0k. Hopefully that all works out well… if it doesnt then go back to the previous page , and then also do the same above for “overide automatic ip detection”

well i hope that helps…

Read full topic

item.title: Why does noone help me?!?
item.dc:creator: @xsaberjrx xsaberjrx
item.description:
@xsaberjrx wrote:

Well whenever your router gets reset or your power goes out, the ports need to be Re-Forwarded. Mine does anyway. Try that again because it wont work if any of that happened. Its worth a try. I hope I helped

Read full topic

item.title: Why does noone help me?!?
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

well sometiems it can be… what you need to do is:

  1. create a static ip look at www.portforward.com (look for their static ip stuff)
  2. make sure the no-ip is reading the ip from the right hardware…a s sometimes it even reads the ip from hamachi… how stupid >.<

Read full topic

item.title: Why does noone help me?!?
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

I need help with no-ip and noone seems to be trying, but it would be greatly appreciated. I port forwarded for my router and my comps firewall, and it did work fine. I was gone for 2 days and I come back and it doesnt work anymore?

[Mon 19:45]  Checking Remote IP Address.
[Mon 19:45]  Current IP address found,

I assume that means it is working correctly, and it says

[Mon 19:52]  Updating host: 
[Mon 19:52]   : DNS is current, no update needed.

which I also assume is working correctly. I opened a support ticket and all they had to say is “Are you sure it is using the right router IP” and “Is the update client finding the IP correctly”
Now, while i was gone, my IP changed, but I don’t think that is a problem.

anybody?
